Content: UI is attractive and clean, however, the weather is hardly accurate. For a weather app, you'd expect weather forecasting to be the primary focus but it feels as if the developers have been focused on news reports more recently. The app is pretty ineffective nowadays and I often find myself checking "The Weather Channel" app for actual weather forecasts (which I used to avoid as it is usually pretty inaccurate.
App Name: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts & Live Storm Radar
Strongest Sub-Dimension Definition: The app is ease to use, accessible, and respond quickly when the users interacts with it.
